name: awa-helper
description: 外星人论坛自动做任务

scripts.test: yamllint src/locales/*.yml && yamllint config.example.yml && eslint src/**/*.ts && npm run build:pre
scripts.build:docker: npm run build:configer && npm run gulp && node scripts/pre.js && tsc && node scripts/build.js --docker && rollup -c
scripts.build:configer: babel src/manager/configer/index.js --out-file src/manager/configer/babel.index.js && uglifyjs src/manager/configer/babel.index.js --compress --mangle -o src/manager/static/js/configer.min.js
scripts.rollup: node scripts/pre.js && tsc && node scripts/build.js && rollup -c
scripts.build:pre: npm run build:configer && npm run gulp && npm run rollup
scripts.pack:win: node --experimental-sea-config AWA-Helper-config.json && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync(process.execPath, 'output/AWA-Helper-raw.exe')" && npx postject output/AWA-Helper-raw.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB AWA-Helper.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && node scripts/icon.js && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('output/AWA-Helper-raw.exe')"
scripts.build:win: npm run pack:win && npm run upx && tar --exclude main.js --exclude md5.txt -zcvf AWA-Helper-Win.tar.gz ./output
scripts.build: npm run build:pre && npm run build:win

author: HCLonely
